channel.title: RSC Project
channel.description:
Hello guys,
About me :
My name is Mike, I am 18 im in College for Web development. Im usually free, I work full time. But always have a computer with me.
Project :
I would like to make a RSC Server for people who love RSC and to let them enjoy the good old days. So basically same rates as real rs, no cutoms ect..
What I have :
I have 2 dedicated computers, one for the server, one for the website
I have vbulletin forums, and a custom homepage already done up, I also will buy a .com domain
Extra money to help out.
So basically I have everything we need, I just dont want to do everything myself.
Add me on msn or skype, only way to contact me. NOT threw here.
madmike1225@hotmail.com
or
madmike1225 (SKYPE)
Thanks,
Mike.

item.title: RSC Project
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Hi mike, ignore the retards. Specially ones like kryptix who can’t pick moderators to do there fucking job even if he tried.

On-topic:

How much web development skil do you have? I myself studied this at college at an A level standard but only to a certain extent in HTML. I am currenty in the midst of a project in which we are starting to develop at www.codestream.org

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Project
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

good thinking bengina we are making after math all pvp apart from towns and dungeons. We will add strip of safe zone under wilderness with portal and bankchest so people can still use wilderness if they wish. All around towns will be 3 levels difference pvp.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Project
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

I wouldnt really bother trying to recreate rsc as there is already rsce… I would look to a different angle on the game and try something people havent seen/been around in a while…

For instance an all out war server where everywhere is wilderness but items/skills still need to be trained and gained.
Or a chaos server in which you have too teams - players choose when signing up - and have defendable territories and they must compete to win training grounds…

Trying to compete against an already established server with only a limited amount of players is like trying to wank yourself off using a knife…

Also with you having your own systems the 14 year old kids in this place will ddos you because they have no lives and think they are badass interz netz hakarz!

Hey but i could be wrong and you may just prove me to be.

Goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Project
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

Oh and spelling ‘through’ as ‘threw’ is fucking atrocious.

Are you really talking shit about someones spelling? You’re an illiterate fuck… Please, just stop you retard.
